skillTree.localised_description: Cooled in the fires of blood and bound with malicious sigils, this vicious weapon enjoys nothing more than draining the lifeforce from any who dare to enter combat against its wielder.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Forged in the image of Khaine himself, this grim visage seals itself to the flesh of the wear, extracting a price in blood for the fury that it inspires in any who would dare to wear it.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Deep devotion to the Bloody-handed God have led to his favour, enabling her to withstand more punishment in melee than others.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Korelei is a master at sprinting into battle, bringing the wrath and the fury of her dark god to those who have chosen to fall beneath their blades on this day.

Korelei’s method of attack is frighteningly simple. When enemies appear she targets the most heavily armored among them and launches herself into the fray. Her twin daggers are coated with a variety of deadly toxins, enabling her to snare, poison, and rip out the heart of her opponent before they even realize what has occurred.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

skillTree.localised_description: "A satisfying battle is one from which I emerge covered in blood."

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: "Happiness is the look in an enemy’s eyes as the last of their life drains away."
In Korelei's hands her twin daggers are sacred objects, drenched in the blood of countless sacrifices to the Lord of Murder.

effects.description: Slave Cost: -33% for Sacrifice to Khaine

skillTree.localised_description: "Khaela Mensha Khaine, for hate's sake, hear our petition -- as blood answers the throat slit. Keep the hearts of the Druchii cold and bitter, wherein the murderous will of our survivor-civilization be preserved for all eternity. Bring death, just and swift, to the weak. Daub the revenger's blade with the blood of enemies old. Watch over the inconstant north. Grant the wild men and their wilderness your darkness. Let blade and bolt bring sacrifice to your altar. Bless the druchii, ever your acolytes and assassins, with murder in your name and victories as certain as spite."

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
An omen, a sign - this being knows things and any who follow will share their glory.
This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Even the merest scratch caused by a blade edged with Manbane causes death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: By screeching one of the seventeen secret names of Khaine, the Death Hag freezes her enemies with horror.

skillTree.localised_description: His gore-red rune blazes upon the Death Hag's brow, marking her as one of the Lord of Murder's chosen.

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Korelei's exploits both on the battlefield and off have earned her the nickname "Mistress of Pain" for the pleasure she derives from tormenting her sacrifices before finally carving open their chests and snatching out their hearts. Korelei's method of attack is frighteningly simple. When enemies appear she targets the most heavily armored among them and launches herself into the fray. Her twin daggers are coated with a variety of deadly toxins, enabling her to snare, poison, and rip out the heart of her opponent before they even realise what has occurred.

	(Lord)

Enemy leadership: -4

	(all units in army)
